scripts.dev: concurrently -c blue,magenta,cyan -n client,server,css "pnpm --filter @chapel/client dev" "cd server && mix phx.server" "cd client && pnpx @tailwindcss/cli --input src/routes/layout.css --output ../server/priv/static/assets/css/app.css --watch"
scripts.test:unit: concurrently -n client,server "pnpm --filter @chapel/client test:unit --run" "cd server && mix test"
scripts.lint: concurrently -n client,server "pnpm --filter @chapel/client lint" "cd server && mix compile --warnings-as-errors"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter @chapel/client build && pnpm --filter @chapel/client build:css && cd server && MIX_ENV=prod mix do deps.get, compile, assets.deploy
